name: Midnight Dispatch
description: A tense noir-thriller about a courier who discovers a package that pulls him into a city-wide conspiracy.

name: Summer at Sea
description: A coming-of-age drama following three friends on their last summer together before college.

name: Quantum Heist
description: A high-tech heist film where a crew attempts to steal the prototype of a quantum computer.

name: The Last Lantern
description: An emotional historical saga about a family keeping an ancient lighthouse alive through war and peace.

name: Code & Karma
description: A witty tech-comedy about two rival programmers forced to collaborate on an app that might change their lives.

name: Orbit Nine
description: A slow-burn sci-fi about a small crew on a deep-space mission facing unexpected moral choices.

name: Under the Mango Tree
description: A cozy romance set in a small village where two childhood friends rediscover each other.

name: Pulse of the City
description: A documentary-style series exploring the hidden subcultures and street artists of a bustling metropolis.

name: Neon Samurai
description: A stylish cyberpunk action film blending traditional swordplay with neon-lit futurism.

name: Kitchen Confidentials
description: A fast-paced dramedy about the chaos inside a Michelin-starred restaurant kitchen.
